title: A Multipot Is Multi Useful
description: A multi-pot is one of the most useful cooking tools in your kitchen. It is a large stockpot, pasta strainer, and steamer basket stacked in one pot.

asset.author: Bedbathandbeyond
asset.hookText: http://blog.bedbathandbeyond.com/bbb-video/multi-pot-means-multi-useful/ A multi-pot is one of the most useful cooking tools in your kitchen. It is a large ...

transcripts:
One of my favorite wedding gifts to give is the multi-pot or multi-cooker. 

[MUSIC PLAYING] 

And if you're not sure what that is, I'll explain. So, as the name implies, it's multiple pieces of cookware that truly have multiple uses. First is a large stock pot, perfect for marinating or brining or for large quantities of soups, stews, really anything that needs lots of room. Next is a pasta basket that holds a ton of pasta. And instead of the heavy, dangerous walk to the sink to pour out the boiling water, you simply lift and strain right where you are. It's perfect. 

But wait, there's more, because my favorite piece is the steamer basket. Because, whether you're steaming artichokes, dim sum, or even crab legs there's lots of room to make it simple. And whether you call it a multi-pots or multi-cooker, it's multi uses will make it multi fabulous. Like this crab. 

[MUSIC PLAYING]
